title: Habit Tracking
description: Input daily activities, categorize habits, and view reports and summaries of your progress.

title: Goal Setting
description: Set achievable goals, plan your habit-building journey, and track your success.

title: Community Support
description: Communicate with your groups, share progress, and motivate each other through group chats and challenges.

title: Personalized Experience
description: Explore habits, groups, and insights with our unique omnidirectional scroll feature and personalized 'For You' page.

title: Rewards and Achievements
description: Keep track of your daily habits, maintain streaks, and earn rewards for completing challenges and maintaining consistency.

title: Insights and Recommendations
description: Receive insights and recommendations to improve your habits and achieve your goals.
